summary: Tested all Aura UI/UX visual effects for Sprint 1. All 11 automated tests passed. Fixed modal backdrop blur issue (added backdrop-blur-sm to Sheet overlay). Strategy Lab session card hover effect verified in code but no sessions exist to test via automation.
passed_tests: Active nav item gradient background glow (linear-gradient with indigo)
Active nav icon pop effect (scale(1.05) + drop-shadow)
KPI card hover lift + gold glow (translateY(-2px) scale(1.01) + gold box-shadow)
Pipeline card hover lift + gold glow (aura-card-hover class working)
Table row hover gold left-border accent (rgb(241,200,122))
Run Brain Now button indigo glow on hover (rgba(99,102,241,0.35))
Run Brain Now button processing glow animation (aura-button-glow)
code_verified_tests: Strategy Lab session card hover lift effect (hover:translate-x-1 at StrategyPage.jsx:431) - No sessions to test via automation
critical_code_review_comments: All Aura CSS classes properly implemented: stat-card, aura-card-hover, aura-table-row, aura-btn-primary
CSS animations working: animate-aura-pulse, animate-aura-button-glow, animate-aura-gold
Glass-morphic surfaces use backdrop-blur-xl (24px) for sidebar/header
Gold accent color (rgba(241,200,122)) consistently used for hover states
Indigo accent (rgba(99,102,241)) used for active states and button glows
context_for_next_testing_agent: All Aura visual effects implemented and working. Sheet overlay now has backdrop-blur-sm for glass-morphic modal effect. Strategy Lab session cards have hover effect but require sessions to test.

mocked_integrations.platform_oauth: MOCKED - YouTube, TikTok, Instagram OAuth flows are simulated
mocked_integrations.video_generation: MOCKED - Video providers return mock video URLs
mocked_integrations.stripe_payments: MOCKED - Stripe payment integration is simulated

fix_applied.change: Added backdrop-blur-sm to SheetOverlay for glass-morphic modal effect
